questionData.instruction: Write a formal email to follow up on your recent job application.
questionData.purpose: To follow up on a job application and reiterate interest.
required_content: Mention the position applied for
Remind them of your strong interest
Briefly highlight a relevant skill or experience
Inquire about the expected timeline for the hiring process
sample_responses: Dear [Hiring Manager Name], I am writing to follow up on my application for the [Job Title] position, which I submitted on [Date]. I remain very interested in this opportunity and believe my skills in [Mention key skill] would be a valuable asset to your team. I would appreciate an update on the status of my application and the expected timeline for the next steps. Thank you for your time and consideration. Sincerely, [Your Name]
questionData.scenario: You applied for a job last week and haven't heard back yet.

questionData.instruction: Write an informal email to your friend apologizing for missing their birthday party and explaining why.
questionData.purpose: To apologize for missing an event and provide an explanation.
required_content: Apologize sincerely for missing the party
Explain the reason you couldn't make it
Express regret about missing the celebration
Suggest meeting up soon to celebrate
sample_responses: Hey [Friend's Name], I'm so incredibly sorry that I missed your birthday party on [Date]. I was really looking forward to celebrating with you, but unfortunately, [Explain reason, e.g., I woke up feeling really sick / a sudden family emergency came up]. I was gutted that I couldn't be there. I hope you had an amazing time! Can we catch up soon so I can hear all about it and give you a belated birthday treat? So sorry again! Talk soon, [Your Name]
questionData.scenario: You were unable to attend your friend's birthday party due to unforeseen circumstances.

questionData.instruction: Write a formal letter of complaint about a faulty product you purchased.
questionData.purpose: To complain about a faulty product and request a resolution.
required_content: Clearly identify the product (name, model, date of purchase)
Describe the specific fault or problem with the product
Explain how the fault affects the product's usability or performance
State the desired resolution (e.g., refund, replacement, repair)
Mention enclosing/attaching proof of purchase
sample_responses:
To the Customer Service Department,

I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with a [Product Name] I purchased from your store on [Date of Purchase] (receipt enclosed). The product's model number is [Model Number].

Upon using the product, I discovered a significant fault: [Describe the fault clearly and specifically]. This issue renders the product [Explain impact, e.g., unusable, unsafe, not functioning as advertised].

As the product is faulty and does not meet acceptable quality standards, I request a full refund or a replacement unit. I have attached a copy of my purchase receipt for your reference.

I look forward to your prompt response and resolution to this matter.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
[Your Address]
[Your Contact Number/Email]
questionData.scenario: You recently bought an electronic device that stopped working shortly after purchase.

questionData.instruction: Write a semi-formal email to a conference organizer requesting specific information about the event schedule.
questionData.purpose: To request specific information about a conference schedule.
required_content: State your interest in attending the conference
Ask for a more detailed agenda or schedule
Mention any specific sessions or topics you are interested in
Express appreciation for their assistance
sample_responses:
Dear Conference Organizer,

I am planning to attend the upcoming [Conference Name] on [Dates], and I am very much looking forward to it.

I am writing to inquire if a more detailed schedule or agenda is available than the one currently on the website. I am particularly interested in sessions related to [Mention specific topic/session type]. Access to a detailed timeline would help me plan my participation effectively.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
questionData.scenario: You are planning to attend a professional conference and need more details about the schedule before registering.

questionData.instruction: Write an informal email to a colleague to thank them for their help with a project.
questionData.purpose: To thank a colleague for their help.
required_content: Express sincere thanks
Mention the specific project or task they helped with
Explain how their help made a difference
Express appreciation for their time and effort
sample_responses:
Hi [Colleague's Name],

Just wanted to send a quick email to say a huge thank you for your help with [Project/Task Name] yesterday/last week. I really appreciated you [Mention specific action, e.g., staying late, helping with the data, giving advice]. It made a massive difference and really helped me to [Explain impact, e.g., meet the deadline, solve the problem].

Thanks again for your time and effort, you're a lifesaver!

Best,
[Your Name]
questionData.scenario: A colleague recently helped you significantly with a difficult task or project at work.
